extension.name: Simple Responsive Slideshow
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description: Simple Responsive Slideshow is a Joomla!3 module implementation for FlexSlider 1.8, the best responsive jQuery slide around.

field.name: animation
field.label: Transition Effect
field.description: Select your animation type, fade or slide

field.name: slideDirection
field.label: Slide Direction
field.description: Select the sliding direction, horizontal or vertical

field.name: flexsliderBgColor
field.label: Slideshow Background Color
field.description: The color for the background of the slideshow

field.name: slideshowSpeed
field.label: Cycling Speed
field.description: Set the speed of the slideshow cycling, in milliseconds

field.name: animationDuration
field.label: Animation Duration
field.description: Set the speed of animations, in milliseconds

field.name: directionNav
field.label: Arrow Navigation
field.description: Navigate between slides using the previous/next arrows

field.name: controlNav
field.label: Control Navigation
field.description: Navigate between slides using the control buttons

field.name: slideshow
field.label: Autorun
field.description: Animate slider automatically

field.name: randomize
field.label: Randomize
field.description: Randomize slide order

field.name: animationLoop
field.label: Animation Loop
field.description: Should the animation loop? If false, previous/next navigation receive disable classes at either end

field.name: pauseOnAction
field.label: Pause On Action
field.description: Pause the slideshow when interacting with control elements, highly recommended

field.name: pauseOnHover
field.label: Pause On Hover
field.description: Pause the slideshow when hovering over slider, then resume when no longer hovering

field.name: keyboardNav
field.label: Keyboard Navigation
field.description: Navigate between slides using the keyboard left/right keys

field.name: mousewheel
field.label: Mouse Navigation
field.description: Navigate between slides using the mousewheel

field.label: Slide 1 Location

field.description: URL for this slide

field.label: Slide 1 Caption

field.name: file1alt
